title: Feature Limit Reached
description: Fired when a user reaches the usage limit for a feature.

featureName.description: Human-readable name of the feature whose limit was reached.

limitType.description: The type of limit that was reached.

currentUsage.description: The current usage value at the time the limit was reached.

limit.description: The maximum allowed value for the limit.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the usage and limit values.

percentUsed.description: The percentage of the limit that has been consumed.
